properties.entry: SELECT REV_NO , USER_NO , PRO_CODE , PRO_NAME , PRO_IMG_PATH , REV_DATE , REV_RATE , REV_CONTENT , FILE_PATH + CHANGE_NAME AS REV_IMG_PATH , REV_TYPE FROM REVIEW JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRO_CODE) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (REV_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_NO , PRO_CODE , PRO_NAME , PRO_IMG_PATH FROM "ORDER-PRODUCT" JOIN "ORDER" USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRO_CODE) WHERE PRO_CODE = ? AND USER_NO = ?
